head.spine.Vec3d module¶

class head.spine.Vec3d.Vec3d(x_or_triple, y=None, z=None)¶

Bases: object

3d vector class, supports vector and scalar operators, and also provides a bunch of high level functions. reproduced from the vec2d class on the pygame wiki site.

angle_around_x¶

gets or sets the angle of a vector in the YZ plane

angle_around_y¶

gets or sets the angle of a vector in the ZX plane

angle_around_z¶

gets or sets the angle of a vector in the XY plane

convert_to_basis(x_vector, y_vector, z_vector)¶
cross(other)¶
dot(other)¶

get_angle_around_y()¶

get_distance(other)¶
get_length()¶

length¶

gets or sets the magnitude of the vector
